features: Full HD Immersive Entertainment - Enjoy gaming, movies, shows and videos in Full High Definition. LG's FHD Monitors present amazingly true color performance with an IPS display to give you an experience that wows from virtually any viewing angle.
3-Side Virtually Borderless Design - Stay focused on your work with a virtually borderless screen on three sides. It's an extra-wide, panoramic desktop experience.
Designed for an Ideal Desktop - The monitor's uni-body design, with ultra-narrow bezel and tilt adjustment is the ideal screen for a desktop setup.
Reader Mode - Watch your monitor for longer periods of time. Reader Mode provides optimal conditions for reading by reducing blue light.
OnScreen Control - You can customize the workspace by splitting the display or adjusting basic monitor options with just a few mouse clicks.

AMD FreeSync Premium - AMD FreeSync Premium equips serious gamers with a fluid, virtually tear-free gaming experience. With at least 120hz refresh rate at minimum FHD resolution and low latency gameplay, you'll never miss a frame of the action as you play at peak performance.

Dynamic Action Sync - Get the closest thing to real-time gaming. Dynamic Action Sync elevates your gameplay for a pro-level experience. Respond to action, opponents, and every moment with reduced input lag and unbelievable performance.

Black Stabilizer - Black Stabilizer is your ally to attack or defend against enemies hiding in the shadows. It delivers a pro-level gaming experience by brightening dark scenes for enhanced vision and a jump on the competition.

Crosshair - Accuracy is at the center of your gameplay with the Crosshair feature. Center-display crosshairs give enhanced vision and pro-level precision for increased accuracy in first-person shooter games.
body.description: Expand your desktop. Work, watch and play in Full High Definition. LG’s 27 inch Full HD (1920 x 1080) IPS monitor portrays true color, bringing a clear view to your work and lifelike scenes to games, movies, shows and videos.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: LG 27MP400-B Put your passion on display with this IPS Monitor Bring new life to work and downtime with a versatile 27-inch 1080p monitor. Featuring a liquid crystal display and ergonomic design, you can enjoy your favorite entertainment & work on that latest passion project without ever missing a beat.

3-Side Virtually Borderless Design Get the most out of your viewing experience with a nearly borderless, 1920x1080 resolution monitor. AMD FreeSync Ready to rise above the pack? Reduce tearing, stutter and lag with built-in AMD FreeSync for seamless gaming. OnScreen Control Quickly adjust monitor settings like volume, brightness and picture from an easy-to-access window.
Wall Mountable Running low on desk space? Mount the 27” FHD IPS Monitor for easy viewing. Refresh Rate 75Hz Stream like you’re the only one watching with an ultra-fast 75Hz refresh rate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great utility and value for the price!
reviews.reviewText: I really wanted a monitor that lets me adjust the height and tilt, and this monitor lets you do both! I do find that I prefer to just keep it at the highest level, but it's good to have an option. The set up was easy, just screwing in a few screws to set up the stand and then attaching the monitor. This monitor also comes with an HDMI to HDMI cord, so if you don't have an HDMI port on your laptop you will need an adaptor. Picture quality is great; I don't game so I don't know if the refresh rate and picture quality is good for that, but I've watched HD movies on this monitor and it's amazing. The 27" screen is large enough for me to fit several windows on it, and it's so much easier for me to do work now--instead of having to toggle back and forth, I can see everything at once. Overall, great product, highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I Guess It's Just What I Needed!
reviews.reviewText: I bought my first desktop computer since 2014 a couple weeks ago. I tried setting it up with an old 24 inch flatscreen TV, and found that the computer's resolution was so much more powerful than the 720p HDTV's max output that everything came out blurry. I found this LG monitor for about $130 and it works perfectly for what I need. The computer I bought is an upgraded Mac Studio M2 Max that I use for music production. I do not need perfect graphics for such a use as this, and this monitor does a perfectly adequate job. The display is clear to my untrained eyes. However, If a person was in need of a monitor for photo or video editing, I would consider one with a higher resolution. All this said, this monitor is perfect for my needs and I am very happy with the price and quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Monitor, one need to know
reviews.reviewText: This is a great monitor. Slim, excellent color.One thing the user needs to know if they are technically challenged. Most monitors automatically detect the correct video connection. This one does not. You need to toggle the power button at the bottom middle of monitor and make a choice between the VGA and HDMI. HDMI handles Video and Audio.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this monitor for an arcade build as it was the perfect size and had a fairly narrow bezel on three sides. It has a good picture and is easy to use. I didn’t use the standard mount so I can’t attest to it, but it mounts to a wall bracket perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what i needed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this monitor! I work from home and use a laptop with 3 monitors. I purchased this one when one of my old ones went out and it is my favorite monitor! I will be replacing the other 2 with this model when they go out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to upgrade my husband's monitor. Clear, crisp monitor with great colors. Excellent monitor for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I am very pleased with this 27MP450-B monitor, it has excellent graphics and a beautiful picture
reviews.reviewText: Before I bought this monitor, I read the reviews on here and on other websites. Then I went to the LG website listed under Product Description on this page and downloaded the Monitor Driver and the On Screen Control Support software (for Windows and Mac) which lets you choose Screen Split (to arrange multiple windows), Monitor Settings, My Application Presets and Game Mode Settings before I bought the monitor.I am not a gamer so I don't have any high quality games to try.I also downloaded the User Manual in PDF format, the link to download the User Manual is under Product Guides and Documents on this page. There is a lot of useful information in this manual.I turned on my computer after connecting this monitor then installed the Monitor Driver through Device Manager in Windows 11. This driver gives Windows 11 full functionality of the monitor.This monitor replaces my old 9 year old Acer. The picture & graphics on this LG FHD 27-Inch 27MP450-B is fantastic! I am very pleased with this monitor and I highly recommend it.The joystick control on the power button is very easy to use and is easy to get to all the settings just by moving the button forward, backwards, left or right. Just push the button in once and the settings menu will be shown in the On Screen Display. This is much easier than all the separate buttons on my old monitor to adjust the settings.I'm glad I got the 27MP450-B with the tilt & height adjustment stand. The height adjustment lets the monitor glide slowly & smoothly up or down and it stays right where you raise or lower it to. There is no lock or adjustment to be made on the stand to raise or lower the monitor, just slowly move it up or down, it doesn't take much pressure to move it.
Easy to install and life saver to me during work! No more neck ache for me

Para empezar tardo años en llegar!!! Pensé que era un problema de configuración, porque las letras en los textos se veían pixeladas, muy borrosas, imposible trabajar así. Después de mucho investigar y probarlo en varias computadoras, pude ver que la calidad de este monitor es pésima, desafortunadamente no leí todas las reseñas antes de comprarlo, de haberlo hecho jamás lo hubiera comprado, increíble que una marca como LG tenga a la venta algo de esta calidad, por un precio ni tan barato. NO LO COMPREN!!!
